## CCSelectorCombinedProps.inputRenderCountRef property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Passes a numeric React ref object to the phone number input component, which is then increased by one every time the component is rendered.

**Signature:**

```typescript
inputRenderCountRef?: MutableRefObject<number>;
```
